channel.title: Comments on: One Step at a Time

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: These single steps are going a long way dude. Every time you post progress of your bike, it makes me wanna do something to my car... =P Of course, that can't happen cuz no moolah. Keep it up Eric! I definitely look forward checkin' the bike out whenever I hit up NorCal.
item.content:encoded: These single steps are going a long way dude. Every time you post progress of your bike, it makes me wanna do something to my car… =P Of course, that can’t happen cuz no moolah. Keep it up Eric! I definitely look forward checkin’ the bike out whenever I hit up NorCal.
